WorkItem.Description:
If the first item is already selected and you press Ctrl-Home, an exception is thrown.
Same with last item and Ctrl-End.
The shortcuts select the item. However, I would rather expect that only the focus is moved (like in other tree implementations).
A patch is attached.
WorkItem.Summary: Exception when pressing Ctrl-Home or Ctrl-End

Comments.Message:
Resolved with changeset 69462: Fix for 23338
Now tests are running in VS2012 Express

Thanks for submitting this bug. I have looked in windows explorer and vs solution explorer. Both are selecting the item on pressing home/end. I have implemented it that way.

At least it does not throw an exception anymore. ;-)

Thanks for fixing!
I agree that Home/End selects the item in various tree implementations, but CTRL-Home/End does not. Even in VS Solution Explorer it only moves the focus.

Thanks for fixing!
I agree that Home/End selects the item in various tree implementations, but CTRL-Home/End does not. Even in VS Solution Explorer it only moves the focus.
